page.title: 13GOING TO WORK FROM ALTON
page.content: People don't come to live in Alton because they work there but because it is a nice quiet village and they can get away from all the bustle of town and city life. There is hardly any employment in Alton and so many people who live there travel to the Potteries,Uttoxeter,Cheadle and Leek. Many people travel about 16 miles to work each day.A lot of professional people come to live in Alton. Occupations include accountants,nurses, directors,shipping clerks,teachers, lecturers,insurance brokers, psychologists,doctors,decorators, shopkeepers and merchants. Many people live on a new estate called Glen Drive, built on open fields.There are 37 houses but the last number is 38.There isn't a number 13 as some people are superstitious and consider it unlucky.
